      • preparePayload

        protected abstract long preparePayload(ParsableByteArray packet)
        Prepares payload data in the packet for submitting to TrackOutput and returns number of granules in the packet.
        Parameters:
        packet - Ogg payload data packet.
        Returns:
        Number of granules in the packet or -1 if the packet doesn't contain payload data.

      • readHeaders

        protected abstract boolean readHeaders(ParsableByteArray packet,
                                       long position,
                                       StreamReader.SetupData setupData)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.InterruptedException
        Checks if the given packet is a header packet and reads it.
        Parameters:
        packet - An ogg packet.
        position - Position of the given header packet.
        setupData - Setup data to be filled.
        Returns:
        Whether the packet contains header data.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
